text:
<@U03PWKBQU76> It seems to me that such a possibility is not provided for. very sad.
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/companies-API-what-is-the-field-name-for-the-logo/m-p/339583>
Hi <@U01QVR44MEY>, have you got any response from HubSpot team regarding redirect url?
Hi - does a data point exist to detail the last send date/time of an email by id?
Someone is asking around internally I'll let you know what I find

hi everybody, i have an api product from HubSpot, which i would like to get from my backend node js i tried many times. it is not working but when i try to it using postman GET the api provided from HubSpot it works fine, can anybody here to help me out, your help will be appreciated in advance many thanks

HubSpot’s Shopify connector app creates a few properties to facilitate the sync. One of them is called “Product Type”, internal name “ip__shopify__product_type”.

The app has been deleted. However, we are unable to delete this property. It has a read only definition.

I’ve tried archiving via API using the v2 and v3 Properties API. I’ve also tried updating this parameter using a PATCH…using a few different keys, some of which were very creative, to no avail.

There’s no way this property just hangs out in the portal indefinitely though, right?

Anyone know how we can go about getting rid of this property?
Hi HubSpot Developers, I have a question about the recent API migration
We have an external form that might be using the API key, not sure if we need to create a private app (If yes, we would need someone to do this for us)
How do I get help from here? Thank you very much!!

<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts>
How I can get records *filter by Ower email?*
You can't filter by email address just owner id, you could build a custom field for the email though and have a workflow fill out the email address for the ower whenever an owner is assigned

Yes, you will need a private app.
You can post this in the jobs channel so that anyone interested could help you.
